name: Sir Lewis Hamilton
introduction: Sir Lewis Carl Davidson Hamilton MBE HonFREng (born 7 January 1985 in Stevenage, Hertfordshire, England, United Kingdom) is a British racing driver who currently drives in Formula One for the Mercedes team, having driven for McLaren from 2007 to 2012. He is a seven-time Formula One World Drivers' Champion, taking the title in 2008 with McLaren, and in 2014, 2015, 2017, 2018, 2019 and 2020 with Mercedes.
